item.description:
Join us for Flirt Fest, Boston's biggest anti-valentine's day party! This year's location will be Tequila Rain, located near Fenway Park. This is a fun night of dancing, pick up lines contest, crowning of Boston's biggest flirt and fun! Tickets are currently on sale, $15 each or 2 for $25. Tickets must be purchased in advance. This event does sell out.

Get your tickets at: http://www.bostoneven...

We will meet inside, near the entrance, past the check-in area. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet inside, near the entrance, past the check-in area. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.name: Flirt Fest, Anti Valentines Party, Discounted Tix
